feed.title: Paper Reviews
feed.subtitle: A collection of paper reviews and academic resources.

entry.title: The Bright Side of Mathematics - Manifolds Course

link.title: The Bright Side of Mathematics - Manifolds Course

entry.content:
The YouTube channel “The Bright Side of Mathematics” offers a variety of courses, including a comprehensive course on manifolds, which is excellent for understanding advanced mathematical concepts.

Watch the manifolds course here: Manifolds Course
entry.summary: The YouTube channel “The Bright Side of Mathematics” offers a variety of courses, including a comprehensive course on manifolds, which is excellent for understanding advanced mathematical concepts.

entry.title: Research Taste Notes from Colah’s Blog

link.title: Research Taste Notes from Colah’s Blog

entry.content:
These notes from Christopher Olah’s blog discuss the importance of developing research taste and provide actionable exercises to improve it.

YouFind the notes here: Colah’s Research Taste Notes
entry.summary: These notes from Christopher Olah’s blog discuss the importance of developing research taste and provide actionable exercises to improve it.

entry.title: Hamming course ‘Learn to learn’
entry.content:
Richard W. Hamming was a prominent American mathematician and computer scientist. This course, “Learn to learn,” provides insights into effective learning strategies, and there is also a book with the same name.

The recorded lessons are available here: Hamming Course
entry.summary: Richard W. Hamming was a prominent American mathematician and computer scientist. This course, “Learn to learn,” provides insights into effective learning strategies, and there is also a book with the same name.

entry.title: Understanding Deep Learning Book
entry.content:
“Understanding Deep Learning” is a comprehensive book that comes with useful notebooks to help in understanding deep learning concepts.

Access the book and notebooks here: Understanding Deep Learning

author.name: Oriol Vinyals, Andrew Senior, Koray Kavukcuoglu, Igor Babuschkin

entry.summary: “Understanding Deep Learning” is a comprehensive book that comes with useful notebooks to help in understanding deep learning concepts.
